definition: thumping sound (onom.)/to be eager and anxious (to do sth)/faithful and upright

sentences.english: My heart turned over when my turn was coming round.
sentences.chinese: 轮到我时，我的心怦怦乱跳。

sentences.english: He carefully picked up his pole. He felt his heart pounding.
sentences.chinese: 他小心翼翼地拿起撑竿，只觉得心怦怦在跳。

sentences.english: His heart thumped audibly as his benumbed hand held the receiver in a desperate grip.
sentences.chinese: 他的心怦怦跳着，痉挛的手死死地攥住电话听筒。

sentences.english: Her heart thumped so that she could scarcely see to go on.
sentences.chinese: 她的心怦怦直跳，几乎无法继续干了去。

sentences.english: My heart struck heavily when it was my turn to answer the questions.
sentences.chinese: 当轮到我回答问题时，我的心怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: Your heart is pounding along with the music as you squirm in your theater seat. The silhouetted ax starts to descend …
sentences.chinese: 你在影院座位上不安地扭动，心随着音乐怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: Steve walked back to his desk, his heart pounding within his chest.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫回到自己的座位，心怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: Just this little approval set Carrie's heart bounding.
sentences.chinese: 就这么一个小小的赞许，弄得嘉莉心头怦怦直跳。
他感觉到心脏在怦怦地猛跳。

sentences.english: His heart fluttered with excitement as he was waiting for the reception by the leaders.
sentences.chinese: 他在等待领导人接见时激动得心怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: She lifted her hand. The heart beat heavily.
To only a few people, I am afraid of heart Pingping jump.
sentences.chinese: 到只剩下几个人时，我害怕的心怦怦跳。
我高兴得心里怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: The sight of her set his heart beating faster.
sentences.chinese: 他一见到她，不由得心就怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: I could feel her heart go thump-thump-thump.
sentences.chinese: 我能感觉到她的心在怦怦地跳。

definition: to jump about/(of the heart) to beat wildly
with a sudden shock, bang etc
to throb/to pulse/to bounce/to jiggle/to jump about
fig. restless, because of fear or strong emotions
Dongdong, cheerleading mascot of 2008 Beijing Olympics
(onom.) beating of the heart/pitapat/pulsation of a machine
to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]
to throb with pain/throbbing pain/twang/pang/CL:陣|阵[zhen4]
